author: Freya McClements
title: Tributes paid to ‘greatly loved’ care worker who died of Covid-19
description: Martina McCarron, from Co Tyrone, did not contract the virus as a result of her occupation, it is understood
content:
A care worker who died of coronavirus in Co Tyrone was greatly loved and respected in her local area, her family has said.
It is understood Martina McCarron did not contract the virus as a result of her occupation.
